UserProfile.Name: Uni Student
UserProfile.Description: To qualify for student discount, students must present (at the time of purchase) a valid photo ID issued by their college or university that shows a course expiry date on. NUS Extra and ISIC cards are not accepted. Travel can be purchased for use until the end of the academic year when the course ends

UserProfile.Name: Under 19
UserProfile.Description: Under 19 cards - proof of age required for first time issue. If you are Under 19, we require proof of your age. This can include a passport, birth certificate, driving licence, medical card or a letter from your school that confirms your date of birth.
UserProfile.ProofRequired: identityDocument passport birthCertificate passport medicalDocument drivingLicence

EligibilityChangePolicy.Name: Travel can be purchased for use until 19th birthday.

UserProfile.Name: Infant
UserProfile.Description: Up to three children under 5 years of age, accompanied by a fare paying adult or child passenger, and not occupying a seat, may travel free of charge on the Company 5day's services.
